japanese: ダムが決壊し、谷は水に飲まれた
english: The dam burst and water flooded the valley

japanese: 彼らは私にこの薬を無理矢理飲ませた
english: They force me to take the medcine

japanese: 空腹でお酒を飲むな
english: Do not drink on an empty stomach

japanese: 良い薬になるだろう
english: It will be a good lesson to him

japanese: だから言っただろう
english: I tried to tell you

japanese: 次の旅行計画を立てなきゃ
english: I need to plan my next trup

japanese: 20日と２１日の午後を空けてあります
english: I have kept the schedule open for the afternoon of the 20th and the 21st

japanese: 本を全部処分した
english: I disposed of all the books

japanese: 彼は言い訳をでっち上げた
english: He made up an excuse

japanese: この切符を取り消せますか？
english: Can I cancel this ticket?

japanese: 赤丸で囲む
english: Circle in red pencil

japanese: その事件の説明は、紙面が足りないため割愛された
english: The explanation of the event was omitted for lack of space

japanese: 彼は我々の感情に訴えた
english: He appealed to our emotions

japanese: そのスピーチの要点は把握できた
english: I was able to grasp the main points of the speech

japanese: 人生は冒険に満ちている
english: Life is full of adventures

japanese: そんなリスクを背負いたくない
english: I don't want to take that risk

japanese: 誰が私の背中を叩いた
english: Someone hit me on the back

japanese: 彼女は夫のそばにぴったり寄り添っていた
english: She stood close to her husband

japanese: 濡れた服を脱ぎなさい
english: Take off your wet clothes

japanese: 毎日五百円ずつ貯めれば、一ヶ月で新しいゲームを買えます
english: If you save 500 yen every day you can buy a new game in one month
